items.sentence: This book hasn\'t yet been translated into French.
Tom asked Mary to teach him how to play the flute.
Tom asked Mary what her plans for the future were.
Tom asked Mary what kind of food she liked to eat.
Tom asked Mary what time she expected to get home.
Tom asked Mary whether she planned to swim or not.
Tom asked me for more money than he really needed.
I can\'t tell you how many times I\'ve been there.
I can\'t understand what you\'re trying to get at.
There are a few apples on the tree, aren\'t there?
My advice to you is to forget about what happened.
My brother went to the United States to study law.
My father planted this tree on the day I was born.
My father sometimes goes to Australia on business.
My father usually watches television after dinner.
You haven\'t told Tom you\'re an ex-con, have you?
You know who Tom\'s French teacher is, don\'t you?
Tom knew that Mary was John and Alice\'s daughter.
Tom knew that Mary wasn\'t going to do that today.
Mary is Catholic, but her boyfriend is an atheist.
Maybe I should spend a few minutes with Tom alone.
My little sister asked me to teach her how to ski.
Nobody can blame you for falling in love with Tom.
I\'ve always thought you knew how to speak French.
I\'ve asked Tom to babysit for us on Monday night.
I\'ve been trying to get Tom to donate some money.
I\'ve never heard Tom say anything bad about Mary.
It looks like Tom hasn\'t shaved in a couple days.
Are you sure you don\'t want to study at my house?
He couldn\'t stand being away from his girlfriend.
Tom wanted me to tell Mary that he wasn\'t coming.
I\'m not sure if I\'m going to be able to do that.
I\'m pretty sure that Tom won\'t agree to do that.
Tom may have said that, but I don\'t think he did.
Tom often reads when his children aren\'t at home.
She married him only because her parents made her.
She was born in 1946, on August 19, in California.
She was ready to help him with cleaning the house.
Some flowers bloom in spring and others in autumn.
Stop beating around the bush and get to the point.
Switzerland is a beautiful country worth visiting.
We wouldn\'t be in this mess if you had helped us.
We\'ll do our best to work as quickly as possible.
We\'ll get to Boston before it gets dark, I think.
We\'ll probably never know why Tom killed himself.
We\'re looking for an apartment with two bedrooms.
Tom was the first to arrive and the last to leave.
We are sorry we are unable to accept your request.
We woke up very early in order to see the sunrise.
I have nowhere to sleep. Can I crash on your sofa?
